TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttribute extends System.Xml.XmlNode

summary.span: 表示属性。

span.span: Represents an attribute.

summary.span: 属性的有效值和默认值在文档类型定义 (DTD) 或架构中定义。

span.span: Valid and default values for the attribute are defined in a document type definition (DTD) or schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可与元素关联。Attributes can be associated with an element. 使用属性来获取属性所属。Use the property to get the to which the attribute belongs. `XmlElement`类具有多种方法可用于访问属性节点 (， ， ，依次类推)。The `XmlElement` class has several methods which allow you to access attribute nodes (, , , and so on). 此外，你可以调用属性，它返回使你能够访问集合中按名称或索引的属性。Additionally, you can call the property, which returns an enabling you to access attributes by name or index from the collection.

The added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`newChild`是已在树中，则将先删除。If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is first removed. 如果插入的节点已创建从另一个文档，则可以使用将节点导入到当前文档。If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use to import the node to the current document. 然后，导入的节点可以插入到当前文档中。The imported node can then be inserted into the current document. ## Examples 有关的示例方法，请参阅方法。For an example of the method, see the method.

exception.span: 该节点是只读的。

span.span: This node is read-only.

.property instance string BaseURI
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property BaseURI As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ BaseURI { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.BaseURI : string

summary.span: 获取节点的基统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the base Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the node.

value.span: 从其加载节点的位置；如果节点没有基 URI，则为 String.Empty。

span.span: The location from which the node was loaded or String.Empty if the node has no base URI.

value.span: 特性节点与它们的所有者元素具有相同的基 URI。

span.span: Attribute nodes have the same base URI as their owner element.

value.span: 如果特性节点没有所有者元素，则 返回 String.Empty。

span.span: If an attribute node does not have an owner element, returns String.Empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联网的 XML 文档的聚合使用各种 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 标准包含机制的数据块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. `BaseURI`告诉这些节点来自何处。The `BaseURI` tells you where these nodes came from. 有关其他信息`BaseURI`以及如何其行为与其他节点类型，请参阅。For additional information on `BaseURI` and how it behaves with other node types, see . 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例显示在属性节点上，包括它的基 URI 的信息。The following example displays information on the attribute node, including its base URI. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此示例使用该文件，`baseuri.xml`作为输入。The sample uses the file, `baseuri.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

param.name: deep
param.span: 如果为 ，则以递归方式克隆指定节点下的子树；如果为 ，则只克隆节点本身。

span.span: to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; to clone only the node itself

summary.span: 创建此节点的副本。

span.span: Creates a duplicate of this node.
The duplicate node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可作为节点的复制构造函数。This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes. 克隆的节点具有没有父级 (返回`null`)。The cloned node has no parent ( returns `null`). 克隆未指定的属性返回指定的属性 (返回`true`)。Cloning an unspecified attribute returns a specified attribute ( returns `true`). ## Examples 下面的示例使用`CloneNode`将属性添加到两个不同的元素节点。The following example uses `CloneNode` to add an attribute to two different element nodes. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用文件，`2elems.xml`作为输入。The example uses the file, `2elems.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

Public Overrides Function InsertAfter (newChild As XmlNode, refChild As XmlNode) As XmlNode

span.span: The to insert.

param.name: refChild

span.span: The that is the reference node.

param.span: newChild 放置在 refChild 之后。

span.span: The newChild is placed after the refChild.

summary.span: 将指定的节点紧接着插入指定的引用节点之后。

span.span: Inserts the specified node immediately after the specified reference node.
The inserted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`refChild`是`null`，插入`newChild`的子节点列表的开头。If `refChild` is `null`, insert `newChild` at the beginning of the list of child nodes. 如果`newChild`是对象及其子节点，相同顺序之后插入`refChild`。If `newChild` is an object, its child nodes are inserted, in the same order, after `refChild`. 如果`newChild`是已在树中，则将先删除。If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is first removed. 如果插入的节点已创建从另一个文档，则可以使用将节点导入到当前文档。If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use to import the node to the current document. 然后，导入的节点可以插入到当前文档中。The imported node can then be inserted into the current document. 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 有关的示例方法，请参阅方法。For an example of the method see the method.

exception.span: 此节点的类型不允许 节点类型的子节点。

span.span: This node is of a type that does not allow child nodes of the type of the node.

span.span: The is an ancestor of this node.

exception.span: 是从不同于创建此节点的文档创建的。

span.span: The was created from a different document than the one that created this node.

exception.span: 不是此节点的子级。

span.span: The is not a child of this node.

exception.span: 该节点是只读的。

span.span: This node is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`refChild`是`null`，插入`newChild`的子节点列表的末尾。If `refChild` is `null`, insert `newChild` at the end of the list of child nodes. 如果`newChild`是对象及其子节点的相同顺序插入之前`refChild`。If `newChild` is an object, its child nodes are inserted, in the same order, before `refChild`. 如果`newChild`是已在树中，则将先删除。If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is first removed. 如果插入的节点已创建从另一个文档，则可以使用将节点导入到当前文档。If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use to import the node to the current document. 然后，导入的节点可以插入到当前文档中。The imported node can then be inserted into the current document. ## Examples 有关的示例方法，请参阅方法。For an example of the method, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从附加到的元素，属性不会继承其命名空间。An attribute does not inherit its namespace from the element it is attached to. 如果属性不显式指定命名空间，被视为命名空间 URI String.Empty。If an attribute is not explicitly given a namespace, the namespace URI is considered to be String.Empty. ## Examples 下面的示例显示在每个属性集合中的节点上的信息。The following example displays information on each of the nodes in the attribute collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改属性的前缀不会更改其命名空间 URI，因为更改的属性具有默认值已知的前缀不创建具有默认值和原始前缀新属性。Because changing the prefix of an attribute does not change its namespace URI, changing the prefix of an attribute that is known to have a default value does not create a new attribute with the default value and the original prefix. ## Examples 下面的示例显示在每个属性集合中的节点上的信息。The following example displays information on each of the nodes in the attribute collection. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The specified prefix is "xml", and the namespaceURI of this node is different from "http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace".

exception.span: 该节点是一个属性，指定的前缀为“xmlns”，且该节点的 namespaceURI 与“http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/”不同。

span.span: This node is an attribute, the specified prefix is "xmlns", and the namespaceURI of this node is different from "http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`newChild`是已在树中，则将先删除。If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is first removed. 如果插入的节点已创建从另一个文档，则可以使用将节点导入到当前文档。If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use to import the node to the current document. 然后，导入的节点可以插入到当前文档中。The imported node can then be inserted into the current document. 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 有关的示例方法，请参阅方法。For an example of the method, see the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Specified { get; }
.property instance bool Specified
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Specified As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Specified { bool get(); };
member this.Specified : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否显式设置了特性值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the attribute value was explicitly set.

value.span: 如果在原始实例文档中显式地为该特性给定一个值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this attribute was explicitly given a value in the original instance document; otherwise, .

value.span: 值指示该特性的值来自 DTD。

span.span: A value of indicates that the value of the attribute came from the DTD.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现都负责此属性，而不是用户。The implementation is in charge of this property, not the user. 如果用户更改 （即使它具有相同的值的默认/固定值结束） 属性的值，然后指定的标志就会自动转为`true`。If the user changes the value of the attribute (even if it ends up having the same value as the default/fixed value), then the specified flag is automatically flipped to `true`. 若要重新指定为 DTD 中的默认/固定值的属性，则用户必须删除该属性。To re-specify the attribute as the default/fixed value from the DTD, the user must delete the attribute. 然后，实现使新的属性可指定设置为与`false`并且默认/固定值 （如果存在）。The implementation then makes a new attribute available with specified set to `false` and the default/fixed value (if one exists). 摘要：In summary: 1. 如果属性在文档中，有一个分配的值`Specified`是`true`，和的值是所赋的值。If the attribute has an assigned value in the document, `Specified` is `true`, and the value is the assigned value. 2. 如果该属性在文档中不具有任何分配的值且中 DTD，具有默认/固定值的`Specified`是`false`，和值是在 DTD 中的默认/固定值。If the attribute has no assigned value in the document and has a default/fixed value in the DTD, `Specified` is `false`, and the value is the default/fixed value in the DTD. 3. 否则，该属性不出现在文档的结构模型中。Otherwise, the attribute does not appear in the structure model of the document.
